channel.title: How do u get npcs to appear?
channel.description: im new to moparscape and i have the codes for npcs, but idk how to make them appear..... and i dont feel like fighting guards anymore, i feel like fighting the kalphite queen

item.title: How do u get npcs to appear?
item.dc:creator: @Fluxedaway Fluxedaway
item.description:
@Fluxedaway wrote:

Oh, you have to edit the npc.java file and find the npc code and edit the hp to whatever you like, otherwise its like they weren’t there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u get npcs to appear?

item.title: How do u get npcs to appear?

item.description:

i know that part, but i hit 0s and they just die…

item.source: How do u get npcs to appear?

item.title: How do u get npcs to appear?
item.dc:creator: @Fluxedaway Fluxedaway
item.description:
@Fluxedaway wrote:

Type ::npc + [npc code here] or edit the source npc spawning X and Y coordinates.

Read full topic
